provision_commands: rm -f /etc/netplan/01-netcfg.yaml;systemctl enable systemd-networkd; curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vmware/cloud-init-vmware-guestinfo/master/install.sh | sudo sh -
boot_command: <esc><wait><esc><wait><enter><wait>/install/vmlinuz<wait> auto<wait> console-setup/ask_detect=false<wait> console-setup/layoutcode=us<wait> console-setup/modelcode=pc105<wait> debconf/frontend=noninteractive<wait> debian-installer=en_US<wait> fb=false<wait> initrd=/install/initrd.gz<wait> kbd-chooser/method=us<wait> keyboard-configuration/layout=USA<wait> keyboard-configuration/variant=USA<wait> locale=en_US<wait> netcfg/get_domain=vm<wait> netcfg/get_hostname=localhost<wait> grub-installer/bootdev=/dev/sda<wait> noapic<wait> preseed/url=http://{{ .HTTPIP }}:{{ .HTTPPort }}/preseed.cfg<wait> -- <wait><enter><wait>
